Room.Name: Large Knothole in the Abyss
Room.Description: The huge chasm stretches endlessly into the depths of the earth, its rugged sides jagged and rough. A narrow walkway has been carved into the rocky walls, winding along the chasm's edge like a perilous ribbon. The walls are steep, the drop into the dark abyss below dizzying. The air is thick and heavy, echoing with the sound of rushing water and the distant rumble of rocks tumbling down into the depths. The chasm seems to go on forever, disappearing into the darkness, and the only way forward is along the narrow walkway clinging to the sides.

ExtraDescription.Description: ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ + + + This area has been converted and adapted by + + Kajko + + + + & + + + + revised, debugged (?:) + + slightly enchanced and balanced by + + Andeus + + + + PS. prepare to die - it is {40 50} area with aggro mobs + + only armed personel allowed + + October'96 + ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Room.Name: Large Knothole in the Abyss
Room.Description: The huge chasm stretches endlessly into the depths of the earth, its rugged sides jagged and rough. A narrow walkway has been carved into the rocky walls, winding along the chasm's edge like a perilous ribbon. The walls are steep, the drop into the dark abyss below dizzying. The air is thick and heavy, echoing with the sound of rushing water and the distant rumble of rocks tumbling down into the depths. The chasm seems to go on forever, disappearing into the darkness, and the only way forward is along the narrow walkway clinging to the sides.

Room.Name: Large Knothole in the Abyss
Room.Description: The huge chasm stretches endlessly into the depths of the earth, its rugged sides jagged and rough. A narrow walkway has been carved into the rocky walls, winding along the chasm's edge like a perilous ribbon. The walls are steep, the drop into the dark abyss below dizzying. The air is thick and heavy, echoing with the sound of rushing water and the distant rumble of rocks tumbling down into the depths. The chasm seems to go on forever, disappearing into the darkness, and the only way forward is along the narrow walkway clinging to the sides.

Room.Name: A dusty tunnel deep under the ground
Room.Description: You stand in a tunnel that appears to have been dug out of the dirt. You do not understand what is keeping the tunnel walls from caving in. This would probably be a very bad place to use a dispel magic spell! You do see some footprints in the dust, and looking up, you see who they belong to!

Room.Name: A room with a large pool of water in the center
Room.Description: This room has a large pool of black water in the center. You see many runes and glyphs surrounding it. The room is lit by torches held in sconces. Each of these items in the room merits more investigation.

ExtraDescription.Description: As you lean forward and look in the pool, you see nothing but the dark murky water. Gradually though, an image forms before you. You recognize the person the image shows. It is the Avatar! Apparently this is a pool that Ciquala uses to scry upon her enemies. The image is so clear, you almost believe you could step into the pool, and appear in Lord British's castle.

The torches are made of a black wood, and as you draw nearer, you find that they do not emit any heat. Indeed, they seem to be radiating cold. The flames are an icy blue, that makes you think twice about getting too close to them.
The sconces are black and shaped liked two hands, cradling the torches between their pointed nails.
The glyphs are drawn upon the stone with what appears to be blood. You do not recognize any of them, and it would probably be a good idea not to touch any of them.
These runes are carved into the rock about the pool. You think you recognize the rune of vision, and another that has something to do with projecting power at a distance.

Room.Name: Ciquala's Laboratory
Room.Description: This room is lined with shelves that contain a multitude of jars, boxes, vials, chests, tubes, glasses, beakers, and other assorted containers. You think that drinking the contents of any might have undesireable effects.

Room.Name: Supply room
Room.Description: This supply room keeps many of the items that are too large to fit in the laboratory itself. You see several corpses that are preserved by the ever-present cold that you have encountered in every room in this tunnel system. Also several crates hold contents, whose scent is enought to make you wish to shut the door immediately. You believe that you hear a noise from behind one of the crates.

Room.Name: Holding Cell
Room.Description: This is nothing more than a small room with a very heavy iron door closing it off from the laboratory. This is where Ciquala's assistants keep the experiments they are working on.

Room.Name: Holding Cell
Room.Description: This is nothing more than a small room with a very heavy iron door closing it off from the laboratory. This is where Ciquala's minions keep the experiments they are working on.

Room.Name: Guard room
Room.Description: The occupants of this room were obviously left here by the Lich to keep intruders like you from bothering her, or learning her plans. There are doors to both the east and west.

Room.Name: A seemingly empty tunnel
Room.Description: This empty tunnel has doors leading in all directions. The roof of the tunnel seems abnormally low and shiny, almost as if it is not dirt. This room is also as cold as all the others were.

Room.Name: The Map Room
Room.Description: This room is filled with maps, apparently containing some of Ciquala's plans. You notice many maps of Lord British's castle. You might be able to gain some information on Ciquala's plans, as well as learn your way through British's castle if you examine the map more closely.

ExtraDescription.Description: As you reach for a map to examine it closer, it bursts into ice cold flames and disintegrates before your eyes. Apparently Ciquala has taken precautions against people snooping in her Lair.

Room.Name: Storage Room
Room.Description: You see many boxes before you, apparently this is a storage room of some sort. You can bet that whatever a lich is storing, that it can't be good for the world in general.

Room.Name: A tunnel with a grate in the floor
Room.Description: You see a grate on the floor. When you look down it, you see several creatures below, humanoid, but you can't make out exactly what they are. There are also doors leading all directions but west.

Room.Name: The Room of the Automatons
Room.Description: You gasp as you realize that these pasty faced people do not seem to have a will of their own. No doubt the work of the Lich. If these monstrosities are allowed to escape into the world, they will cause no end of problems for Midgaard.

Room.Name: Torture Chamber
Room.Description: This room is fitted with many instruments and tools designed to cause pain and fear in anyone who enters. However, you don't pay as much attention to the racks and iron maidens as you would if were not for the lich in the room.

Room.Name: Entrance to Ciquala's Throne Room
Room.Description: This does not look like any of the other rooms you have been in up till now. The ceiling rises a full 40 feet in the air above you. The walls are covered with murals proclaiming the might and majesty of Ciquala. She does not look old and decayed as you would have pictured her. Instead, she looks rather regal and stately, but undoubtedly evil.

Room.Name: Ciquala's Throne Room
Room.Description: This room is clothed in darkness, and a chill eminates from the foul monarch of the undead. A large tapestry hangs behind her throne. The ceiling rises above you, hidden in the darkness beyond the range your light can penetrate. A feeling of hopelessness and insignificance overwhelms you as you face the Lich, Ciquala!

Room.Name: Treasure Chamber of Ciquala
Room.Description: This room contains enough wealth to fund an army, perhaps a small kingdom. Racks or weapons, and spellbooks, and potions, not to mention large piles of coins that cover the floor. A large paving stone in this room seems slightly disturbed.

Exit.Description: The stone appears to hide a secret passage going down.

ExtraDescription.Description: The paving stone seems to be masking a passage down into a pit below this room.

Room.Name: The hidden crypt of Ciquala
Room.Description: This room contains several crypts where the lichs and vampires rest. Unfortunately, they all seem to be out of their crypts right now.

NPC.name: lich guardian
NPC.description: The Guardian lich looks like a decaying corpse, with small glowing points of light for eyes.
NPC.longDescription: The Guardian Lich steps out of the shadows and attacks!
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible Infrared Hide Flying DetectIllusion DetectInvis PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: vampire assistant
NPC.description: This lab assistant was chosen from amongst the undead for both his knowledge of magic, and his rather nasty disposition. He revels in creating loathesome, twisted, warped creatures to serve Ciquala.
NPC.longDescription: A lab assistant turns toward you and bares his fangs!

NPC.name: creature nightmare
NPC.description: This creature may resemble some kind of serpent, but some parts of it are covered with scales, and others with hair. It's head has 1 large bulbous eye, much like that of an insect. Long talons reach out for you to shred you alive.
NPC.longDescription: A warped creature as if from a nightmare is here.
NPC.shortDescription: a warped creature from a nightmare

NPC.name: creature docile
NPC.description: The creature would probably not hurt a fly. Actually, it is unaware of its own existence.
NPC.longDescription: A docile creature stands here, probably from an experiment that failed.

NPC.name: black pudding crate
NPC.description: As you examine this crate, a black tarlike substance seeps between the boards slowly eating the wood away. It is a black pudding!

NPC.name: gigantic automaton
NPC.description: This gigantic construct is made of a metallic substance that you do not recognize. He stands about 8' tall, brushing the ceiling.
NPC.longDescription: A gigantic automaton blocks your way.

NPC.name: undead guardian
NPC.description: This creature is a hovering dark shape. It does not seem to have a body so to speak. As it approaches you, a harsh chill makes you shiver.
NPC.longDescription: An undead guardian screams at you and attacks!
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis Flying DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: roof ceiling lurker above
NPC.description: The ceiling appears rather shiny. Not like dirt at all. You suddenly realize that it isn't a ceiling, but a LURKER ABOVE! You had better attack before it drops on you!

NPC.name: vampire servant
NPC.description: This vampire looks very pale and thin. Ciquala has not been allowing him enough time at night to feed properly. He is VERY happy that you walked in on him.
NPC.longDescription: A vampire servant to Ciquala is here, hungering for your blood.

NPC.name: human automaton
NPC.description: This mindless lump of flesh used to be human. It's flesh has been converted to a dull grey substance. The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce opponent.
NPC.longDescription: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.

NPC.name: human automaton
NPC.description: This mindless lump of flesh used to be human. It's flesh has been converted to a dull grey substance. The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce opponent.
NPC.longDescription: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.

NPC.name: human automaton
NPC.description: This mindless lump of flesh used to be human. It's flesh has been converted to a dull grey substance. The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce opponent.
NPC.longDescription: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.

NPC.name: human automaton
NPC.description: This mindless lump of flesh used to be human. It's flesh has been converted to a dull grey substance. The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce opponent.
NPC.longDescription: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.

NPC.name: torturer lich
NPC.description: You'd better not look to close, he may charm you.
NPC.longDescription: A blackened creature stands here, ready to cause you excruciating pain.
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion DetectInvis Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: undead dragon
NPC.description: This skeletal dragon is an ancient red dragon preserved through arcane magic.
NPC.longDescription: Ciquala's undead pet dragon is here, snacking on a fresh corpse.

NPC.name: Ciquala lich
NPC.description: Ciquala still looks majestic after all these thousands of years. But you can see the menace in her eye as she looks at you, and prepares her first spell.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful, evil looking lich stands here, Ciquala, the oldest of all the undead.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: lich
NPC.description: The Lich looks like a decaying corpse, with small glowing points of light for eyes.
NPC.longDescription: The Lich wonders what you are doing in its crypt.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: vampire
NPC.description: The vampire looks incredibly strong. He is wearing musty clothes, and has large fangs that seem to grow longer as he looks back at you.
NPC.longDescription: The vampire is very hungry. With you here, he won't even have to go out hunting for fresh blood tonight.

NPC.name: vampire assistant
NPC.description: This lab assistant was chosen from amongst the undead for both his knowledge of magic, and his rather nasty disposition. She revels in creating loathesome, twisted, warped creatures to serve Ciquala.
NPC.longDescription: A lab assistant turns toward you and bares her fangs!

Item.Name: ciquala's sword
Item.LongDescription: A large, black sword lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Dark NoDrop AntiGood NoRemove Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: ciquala's robe
Item.LongDescription: A heavy pile of black cloth lies in the dust.

Item.Name: Ciquala's staff
Item.LongDescription: A black staff lies on the ground.

Item.Name: crate
Item.LongDescription: A crate stands here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A key lies on the ground.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A iron key lies on the ground.

Item.Name: key large
Item.LongDescription: A large key lies on the ground.

Item.Name: blue potion
Item.LongDescription: A blue bottle of liquid lies here.

Item.Name: emerald vial
Item.LongDescription: An emerald vial lies here

Item.Name: purple potion
Item.LongDescription: A purple potion lies forgotten on the ground.

Item.Name: testube clear
Item.LongDescription: A clear testube contains an unknown liquid.

Item.Name: vial green
Item.LongDescription: A green vial sits on a shelf.

Item.Name: gold liquid vial
Item.LongDescription: A vial with a gold colored liquid sits on the floor.

Item.Name: milky liquid vial
Item.LongDescription: A vial with milky liquid sits on the shelf.

Item.Name: black potion
Item.LongDescription: A black potion is waiting to be picked up.

Item.Name: beaker yellow
Item.LongDescription: A beaker filled with yellow bubbling liquid sits on the counter.

Item.Name: iron maiden
Item.LongDescription: An iron maiden sits here, looking rather unused. Why not try it on?

Item.Name: torturer's whip
Item.LongDescription: An enormous whip lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Invisibility Magic Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: treasure coins gold
Item.LongDescription: A humongous pile of gold is waiting to be picked up.

Item.Name: gems pile
Item.LongDescription: A pile of gems lies on the ground.

Item.Name: crate
Item.LongDescription: A crate stands here.

Item.Name: crate
Item.LongDescription: A crate stands here.

Item.Name: crate
Item.LongDescription: A crate stands here.

Item.Name: crate
Item.LongDescription: A crate stands here.

Item.Name: fizzing bottle
Item.LongDescription: A bottle of fizzing liquid lies here.

Item.Name: grey potion
Item.LongDescription: A grey potion sits on the counter.
